item.title: Off Topic
item.dc:creator: _rot_fodder
item.description:
So here we have a thread placed in the technology subforum named after the Misc. subforum with content belonging in the Half Life series subforum. Thats pretty impressive.

If Gabe fired a bunch of Half Life developers I’m fairly sure it confirms that he hates Half Life and it’s fans and he wants torment all of us some more. I think it’s safe to say it had nothing to do with normal reasons to fire people.

Read full topic
